column4: anyone know of a really good mixer that will kick ass for things like TeamSpeak?
sound card mixer...  ex. alsa, OSS
can't get TeamSpeak to work right...people can barely hear me
Are you referring to a gui mixer control, like the Volume Control or alsamixergui?
and the ALSA mixer option in Volume Control isn't cutting it?
nope...people can barely hear me and I have it turned all the way up
have you tried manually adjusting the necessary sliders in alsamixer (running in a Terminal)?
did you answer my earliest question?
I haven't tried it in a terminal

use the left and right arrows to move between sliders; use 'm' to unmute; use the up and down arrows to adjust the slider levels; use the space bar to select; use F3/F4 to toggle between playback/capture views
problem is I don't know what command to invoke the command line mixer
no different...and I need sleep...gnite and thanks for the help
ok thanks....makes me cringe that windows uses this sound card more effectively...nite
